unnormalised: Bore, konnem tor Bharotantleo sadaronn ER sthitinchea vishayant vicharle. Bare, thoDe zait asa. Ek mhotvachem mhanje nischit rupan rosto apghat. Tum tthan tthan zat aslolim auto-rickshaws, bikes, ani kaddeche traktor legun dhapttim yetana ditat, khas korun NH-44 aschea zageanchea laggi. AIIMS sarkhea hospitalachim ER sadharan 8 PM-10 PMchea vellar vadd zatana dista. Magir, tumchea laggi sadaronn cardiac vostu asta.
normalised: Boro, konnem tor Bharotantlea sadaronn E-R sthitinche vixim vicharlem. Kiteak mhonnlear khup zaiteo asat. Ek vhoddli sthiti mhonnlear rosteacher zanneari. Tum tankam zaiteo auto-rickshaw, bikes, ani ken’nach tractor pon zannearint aslele pollounsakta, khas korun N-H-forty four jea zageancher. A-I-I-M-S sarkhea hospitalantlea E-R hanga sadharanponnan rattchea att P-M thaun dha P-M vellar hi sankya vaddta. Ani magir, tumkam sadaronn cardiac vostu astach.

unnormalised: Heart attacks ani strokes durbhaghyan sadaronn asta. Zaite lok suruvatichim lakshanank dukhol korun taka ekdum usir zata ten’na ERant dhaddtat. Ami zaite lokanchea vostu ditat je chest pain 6 AMchea vellar yetat, tacan tanka fuddgi zata mhunn chit’tat. Dr. Sharma zaite pavtt sangtat, "Vel mhanje muscle," mhanje kitlench veget tum hospitalan yetat, tevnenche veget bore. Fortis Hospitals sarkhe zageancher vishisht cardiac units asat mhunn yad dovrat. Kaim barobor na mhunn dista zalear udeer korunk naka.
normalised: Heart attack ani strokes dubed khup sadaronn. Zaite zann surveche lakxannank lakx divonam ani magir E-R hantunt dhavtat jem ekdom ushir zata. Ami zaitim cases pollaitanv jeo lok sanjechea so A-M vellar chati dukhtai mhonn yetat, tankam disata hem acidity mhonn. Doctor Sharma khub pavtim mhunntat, "Vel mhonnlear muscle," mhonnlear tum zaito rokddo hospitalant vochot, tem borem. Ugddas dovrat, Fortis Hospitals sarkhea zageancher khas cardiac units asat. Kitem tori sarkhem disona tor ushir korunk naka.

unnormalised: Mumbai ani Delhi vellar respiratory vostunchea vishayant vadd dakhoytat Diwali vellar firkitanche pollutionsaarkhene. Zaite zanne vhoddle lok ani asthmachiche bhurgim ERant yetat, tanka nebulization va ventilatorsanchi goroz asta. Jaslok ani Breach Candy sarkhim hospitals Mumayant heal surges zanna rakhunk protos asat. Respiratory healthacher hava gunavattichicho dabbo dukhol korunk naka.
normalised: Toxench, Mumbai ani Delhi hanga Diwali vellar respiratory cases vaddtat kiteak mhonnlear phattke fodtleantlean pollution zata. Zaite vriddh lok ani osthmo aslelim bhurgim E-R hantunt yetat, tankam nebulization ani ventilator chi goroz poddta. Mumbai-che Jaslok ani Breach Candy sarkhea hospitals hankam hi vadh samballunk protocols asat. Hawa gunvatticho respiratory sohataichea aroycher zatlo probhav komi korun chukunam.

unnormalised: Nimanne, sarpachem chab’kam, khas korun gamvgire zageancher ani monsoonchea vellar. ERachi eke vegim vattak zata ani sarpachicho prakar zanun ghetle zalear upcharachea vellar khup madat korta. Anti-snake venomachi ek dose sadaronn upchar asta. Mhanun, bore ERs Bharotant khup busy asa, ekach prokarchea emergencies zannam rakhunk. Asha kortam tem madat kortolem!
normalised: Xevttim, sampanche das, khas korun gramin bhaganim ani pausachea tempar. E-R hankam vegim vochpachi goroz asta, ani sampacho prokar kollop upcharak khup sohok zata. Anti-snake venom-acho ek dose sadaronn upchar. Mhonnlear, ho, Bharotantle E-R khup busy zage zatat, tanchea sangata dhar torechea emergency asat. Mhaka bhorvanso asa hem madat kortolem!
